name: betting-app-monorepo
description: Full stack betting application with microservices architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:fixtures" "npm run dev:odds"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend/main-service && npm run build && cd ../fixtures-service && npm run build && cd ../odds-service && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/main-service && npm install && cd ../fixtures-service && npm install && cd ../odds-service && npm install
